net.proteusframework.core.metric

Class RemMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric
      • net.proteusframework.core.metric.RemMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RemMetric
extends Metric
    Metric for the Root Em unit.

    See http://www.w3.org/WAI/GL/css2em.htm and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Em_(typography)

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
